document_data.name: Shalasta Stormsword
document_data.mainbody: '''Sharlasta stormsword''' was a sea-captain in [[Waterdeep]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.Activities: Sharlasta was the captain of the "[[Ravenous]]". She was an infamous pirate.
document_data.History:
In the late 1480s or early 1490s [[DR]] Sharlasta and her ship were captured by the [[Lords' Alliance]] and she was chained in [[Neverwinter]].
Eventually lord [[Dagult Neverember]] offered her to release her from custody if she under orders of the Lords' Alliance travel in search of the "[[morkoth (ship)|Morkoth]]
